analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/6/0xa28aed076ee69fc20b3fa1917aa0928291cfdeee.sol:
	Contract GREMToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0xa28aed076ee69fc20b3fa1917aa0928291cfdeee.sol#237-238)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
